Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down a damp and dusty hallway carved from the rocks.
Room.LongDescription: Strangely, the walls of the hallway are perfectly square. It's almost like you're walking through a regular building, except the walls are composed of granite and ice. The hallway continues to the north and south. An eerie silence continues as you walk around the desolate hall.
